ourday.title:
We can’t wait to welcome you
to our celebration
ourday.p1: The celebration begins at 12:30 PM, and we kindly ask everyone to arrive by then so we can start this special day together.
ourday.p2: We’ll kick things off with a relaxed buffet outside the venue, a chance to enjoy some food, drinks, and good company under the open sky.
ourday.p3: Afterwards, we’ll move inside for a joyful lunch filled with music, laughter, and dancing, a true celebration to share with all of you.
ourday.p4: To end on a sweet note, we’ll head back outside for the cutting of the cake and more moments to cherish together.

travel.locationP1: Nestled in the hills above the Adriatic coast, Borgo Fonte Scura in Silvi is a charming historic residence surrounded by olive trees and sweeping sea views.
travel.locationP2: Its timeless atmosphere and natural beauty make it the perfect place for us to celebrate this special moment with the people we love most.
travel.infoP1: For those joining us from afar, the closest airport is Pescara Airport (PSR), or you can reach us by train via Pescara Centrale station.
travel.infoP2: For our guests coming from abroad, we will be organising transportation from your arrival to your departure, so you can relax and enjoy the celebration with us!

gifts.title: Gifts Guide
gifts.p1: We are deeply grateful for your presence at our wedding, it is truly the most meaningful gift.
gifts.p2: As we live in London and are celebrating in Italy, transporting physical gifts would be a challenge.
gifts.p3: If you would like to offer us a gift, we would be so thankful for a contribution to our first home fund.

q1.title: By when do I need to confirm my attendance?
q1.body: Please confirm your attendance via the RSVP form by August 1, 2026.

q2.title: When do I have to arrive?
q2.body: If you’re coming from abroad, please arrive on Friday the 11th of September to avoid any issues.

q3.title: What's the dress code?
q3.body: We kindly ask our guests to dress in formal wear to match the tone of our celebration. For the ladies: we’d appreciate if you could avoid wearing white, black, or red. Feel free to take inspiration from the pastel colours of our invitation.

q4.title: Will there be options for dietary requirements?
q4.body: Yes, please let us know in the RSVP form, and we’ll do our best to accommodate your preferences or needs.

q5.title: Are children invited?
q5.body: Yes! We kindly ask you to let us know as soon as possible if you’ll be bringing your children, so we can arrange entertainment for them, and to indicate their age on the day of the wedding in the RSVP form.

q6.title: Is there a gift registry?
q6.body: Please refer to the "Gifts" section for more information.

q7.title: Who can I contact if I have questions before the wedding?
q7.body: You can personally contact us, we’ll be more than happy to help.
